title: crashing just before champions screen load-up... when is it getting properly fixed
body:
This problem is on and off all the time.
It happened to me 2 times in the past and I am now experiencing it once again.
I have not run out of internet data, and my ping is normally around 25-35
so that tells me it is not my internet (despite it telling me that is the problem)
This problem is also giving me leaver buster, which is really very annoying.

I have uninstalled the client and reinstalled (not a fix)
I have also followed some other suggestions by other people having the same issue (delete Logitech ect. also not a fix)
Once there is an update, it sometimes fixes the problem.
But it returns after an amount of time.

Is there a quick fix?
or is the entire problem going to be fixed in an upcoming update, if so when?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).

I have run a client repair didn't fix it unfortunately
I have also scanned my entire computer and removed many programs just to be on the super cautious side.
I try very regularly to join games but it is still happening.
I try creating a private game and it happens same as always, goes to champion select, after the countdown when champion load up screen is suppose to come up my screen stays black until I get the error message telling me it has crashed.

Could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if the issue continues.
